short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed primary for http://dev.expanscience.preciconnect.net/.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can publish a stream that uses a video view of a screen  (instead of camera)  the source. A client connected  to the session can subscribe  to the stream (and view it), just as they would subscribe to a stream that uses a camera as the source.
